author: Luis A. Cruz
subject: Re: That's it. I'm leaving.
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

> fansub.....if only I can figure out some way to hook two vcrs
> together and make a copy...  

You can buy a two deck VCR pretty cheap these days; they work very
well
for running off duplicate tapes.

> >*sigh*  That's the peril of the net, having to deal with clueless
> >jerks.
> 
> I guess I'm a clueless jerk, complaining about cheesy jokes dubs
> add in that aren't in the original.  

Should have qualified that statement.  I meant that someone who
writes you
to tell gripe specifically about your sig (which is what the original
post
seemed to indicate) is basically being a jerk IMO.  If you want to
discuss
or complain about dubbing in general, be my guest, but don't jot a
note to
someone griping about their sig.  Maybe I am being the jerk here and
misunderstanding what the original post meant and stuffing my foot
farther
down my throat. :)

> If we already don't have it subbed....(ask me, I will tell you
> where you can still get it....I got my copy from this particular
> fansub distro)  

Yeah, I'm sure I could get a fansubbed copy, but I would rather get
it on
DVD.  Vote with my dollar to try to get more Lupin over here. :)

- ---
Luis A. Cruz
cruzl@ccs.neu.edu
http://www.ccs.neu.edu/home/cruzl/
Anime Video Game Resource Center: 
http://www.ccs.neu.edu/home/cruzl/avrc/
